headline: A Look At Southern Copper (SCCO) Valuation After Cramer’s New Position And Wells Fargo Outlook
summary: Southern Copper (SCCO) is back in the spotlight after Jim Cramer disclosed a new position while cautioning on rich copper pricing, alongside Wells Fargo’s more optimistic outlook tied to 2026 supply and tariff trends. See our latest analysis for Southern Copper. Those comments land after a strong run, with Southern Copper’s 30 day share price return of 25.66% and 90 day share price return of 42.21% helping lift the latest share price to US$180.95. Its 1 year total shareholder return of 96.89%...
